derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: modern Latin, named after William Cattley (died 1832), English patron of botany

means.word_mean: 1. any orchid of the genus Cattleya characterized by a hood-shaped three-lobed lip enclosing the column; among the most popular and most extravagantly beautiful orchids known
